pages.text: The use of Arcane Means to manipulate Plant Life is well-attested throughout History, and as has long been recorded, our Art should be No Different. Through simple examination of the Verdant Power, some wondrous Results arise.

First, using the $(4)Verdant Power$(0) of Plant Life and the Third Base Power under a Golden Symbol, a Reaction may occur which Miraculously Grows surrounding Crops. $(br2)Note that the Reaction will only attempt to grow Crops $(4)at the same elevation as the Crucible and one Block lower$(0).
Additionally, certain plants can be Created by fusing a $(item)Vine$(0) with various Base Powers.
Fusion with the Vital power, for instance, produces a plant whose vivacious nature cannot be understated.
Many of these Life-Forms are somewhat Unnatural in Appearance.
Indeed, deeper Study of some of these Specimens may be worth considering.
Even those strange plants of the Netherworld can be produced in this way.
Amongst the achievements of Alchemy, these Procedures must be counted.
